question: If a character knows why, can a level X character, of race Y, and class Z research vestiges of the betrayer gods?
answer: A character can research vestiges of the Betrayer Gods if they knew why, and there might be consequences to that research.
rules: Section 5 of CC-BY-4.0 > Disclaimer of Warranties and Limitation of Liability
rules_explanation: The Dungeon Master makes the ultimate call if vestiges can be researched. As such, it is up to their discretion if researching these items results in dire or terrible consequences. The document disclaims any warranty or liability for consequences suffered in the game.
